Then, at the tall ride, someone says, "This is the scariest part," then excited yells and a splashdown are heard, which corresponds to event 5. Finally, in the arcade, a voice boasts, "I'm a pinball wizard," pointing out a row of pinball machines, which corresponds to event 6.
